Add your review Blogger reviews Bloggers, have you reviewed this restaurant? Add your review to this page. Diner reviews
Diner reviews are sorted by relevance
May 13, 2012 Doesn't like it Mobile review by Bman ( 16 reviews ) Omg worst service almost ever. Yes it is McDonald's but look at your customer when they drive up and give them the freaking food before it goes stone cold. This McDonald's has to be the worst ever. August 28, 2011 No egg means no egg!! by Saskriderfan20 ( 12 reviews ) I order the Sausage McMuffin for $1.39... it does not say"without egg"on the menu but if you do not say that phrase they often make the error... I have had it happen 3 visits in a row... and they even once argued with me that I said with egg! I have an allergy so I think not. I would have complained to the manager but that is who was serving me. October 16, 2011 Doesn't like it Why are you reading food reviews if you eat here? by Travelling Gourmand ( 14 reviews ) It's a McDonald's! If you have ANY love of good food, why are you eating here? Or even considering eating here? That said, I tried their"breakfast mcmuffin"once as I dashed out of town one morning on an urgent errand. It managed to confirm everything I thought about McDonald's. They haven't changed in at least 30 years - their food still tastes like I imagine that warmed over cardboard and glue would taste like. June 28, 2009 Doesn't like it Mobile review by Bella Swan ( 15 reviews ) There are no words to describe it. Yuck almost covers it all.
